description:
If you have been injured in Atlanta, Georgia, we have dedicated lawyers on our team who are eager to fight for you. While personal injury law is the practice area Jackson Hagood Trial Lawyers LLC are known for, we also handle cases in the areas of wills, trust and estates.

Our Personal Injury Practice Areas

When most people think of personal injury law, car crashes and truck accidents come to mind. These certainly make up a big part of what we do, but our law office handles several other types of personal injury cases too:

  • Premises liability
  • Wrongful death
  • Slip-and-fall accidents
  • Dog bites

From a geographical standpoint, we serve the entire metro Atlanta area. We are also willing to take on the right cases from the rest of Georgia. It all starts with a free consultation with our law office.

Why Choose Jackson Hagood Trial Lawyers LLC

Personal injuries can wreak havoc in your life. They could turn your health upside down and lead to long-term or permanent disabilities. While recovering from your injuries, you could lose your income or find out that you will never be able to resume your work again. Our law office has built a reputation for representing clients at some of the most difficult times of their lives and for advising them when making the biggest decisions.
